features: The Apple – Red Delicious is known for its crisp texture and mildly sweet flavor, making it a popular choice for healthy snacking. Its bright red skin and juicy white flesh are not only visually appealing but also packed with antioxidants and dietary fiber that support overall wellness. Low in calories and naturally refreshing, it’s an excellent addition to fruit salads, desserts, or enjoyed fresh on its own. This apple variety is perfect for those who prefer a light, subtly sweet taste combined with a satisfying crunch.
images/products/1-2.jpg

specifications.Claimed Size: Medium to Large (150–200g per apple)
specifications.Recommended Use: Best consumed fresh, can be used in desserts and fruit salads
specifications.Manufacturer: Local Organic Farms

features: Fresho! Grapes – Thompson Seedless (1 Pack, approx. 500 g) are premium-quality grapes known for their sweet-tart flavor and crunchy texture. When fully ripe, they turn from pale green to a light golden shade, making them visually appealing as well as delicious. The clusters are naturally loose, so some grapes may shake off the stems, but this is a sign of their authentic quality. These seedless grapes are rich in vitamins A, C, and K, and are known to support digestion, relieve constipation, and aid in maintaining kidney health. They are also linked with benefits such as weight management and protection against heart, nervous system, and certain cancer risks. Best enjoyed fresh as a snack, they can also be added to salads, curd rice, or even frozen to chill beverages. For maximum freshness, they should be washed, patted dry, and stored in the refrigerator. Sourced from trusted regions like South Africa, Australia, Egypt, or Italy, Fresho ensures that every pack delivers freshness and nutrition in every bite.
images/products/2-3.jpg

specifications.Claimed Size: Approx. 500g per pack
specifications.Recommended Use: Best enjoyed fresh as a snack, can be added to salads, desserts, or frozen for beverages
specifications.Manufacturer: Marketed by Innovative Retail Concepts Pvt. Ltd., sourced from South Africa, Australia, Egypt, or Italy

features: The Alphonso Mango, often called the “King of Mangoes,” is one of the most premium and sought-after varieties in India, especially popular during the summer season. Known for its rich golden-yellow skin with a slight reddish tinge, Alphonso mangoes have a smooth, non-fibrous pulp and a naturally sweet aroma that makes them distinct. Each fruit generally weighs between 200–300 grams, depending on the season and origin.
images/products/3-3.jpg

specifications.Claimed Size: Medium to Large (200–300g per mango, varies by season)
specifications.Recommended Use: Best consumed fresh, can be used in milkshakes, smoothies, desserts, or as a topping
specifications.Manufacturer: Sourced from Ratnagiri and Devgad farms, Maharashtra - Marketed by Local Distributors

features: Guava is a tropical fruit known for its unique flavor, pleasant aroma, and high nutritional value. The fruit has a green outer skin that may range from smooth to slightly rough, with a soft or crunchy texture inside, depending on the variety. The pulp can be white, pink, or red and is dotted with tiny edible seeds. Guavas are naturally rich in dietary fiber, vitamin C, and antioxidants, making them excellent for boosting immunity, aiding digestion, and supporting overall health.
images/products/4-3.jpg

specifications.Claimed Size: 1 kg per pack (number of fruits may vary by size)

features: Cow Premium Bilona Ghee is a traditionally prepared ghee made using the Bilona method, an ancient Vedic process. Fresh curd made from cow’s milk is churned bi-directionally to extract makkhan (butter), which is then slow-cooked to produce pure golden ghee. This method preserves natural nutrients, aroma, and granular texture, ensuring a rich and authentic taste.
images/products/20-2.jpg

specifications.Claimed Size: Available in jars/packs (250 ml, 500 ml, 1 L)
specifications.Recommended Use: Ideal for cooking, frying, baking, and Ayurvedic consumption
specifications.Manufacturer: Produced by certified dairy farms using traditional Bilona process
